attributes.action: Investigate the suspected Man-Made Global Warming hoax.
attributes.background: Stop government promotion of the Man-Made Global Warming theory and stop the unquestioning promotion and funding of the all related policies. Call for an international review of the same..

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you mean by Man-Made Global Warming hoax and what and how you would like the Government to investigate. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
